April 11! Tremendous proof that the Venezuelan people were subjected to! Blessed are you, my people! We will live and we will win!
Live the community media! Let's continue with the bourgeois hegemony! Bravo Izarra!
Long live our martyrs of April 11! Hugs Elias and all the Venezuelan people. I'm putting on my campaign boots! Wait for me!!
What a joy there is in Los Teques! Repeat me the songs and screams! I liked the codfish, Elias! Let's sing, let's sing! Long live LaPatria!

Thank you for reading my proposals, presented more than 3 months ago! #AllHollande #DPDA
A tax reform of magnitude is not a structural reform? #AllHollande #DPDA
Making a new step in decentralization is also a major structural reform. #AllHollande #DPDA
These reforms are not flag bearers. They are made to be effective and fair. #AllHollande #DPDA
My duty is to restore the country, in justice. #AllHollande #DPDA
I understood that some used a crisis in the euro area to criticize the alternation! #AllHollande #DPDA
The role of a politician is not to play with speculation. #AllHollande #DPDA
The role of a politician is to dominate the markets. #AllHollande #DPDA
The treaty only provides disciplines and sanctions that would introduce austerity for years. #Europe #AllHollande #DPDA
We must renegotiate the treaty to complete it with a growth device! #Europe #AllHollande #DPDA
The ISF will not be multiplied by three, since I will return to the scale lightened by Nicolas Sarkozy. #AllHollande #DPDA
Me, I'm not a candidate "pocket-surprise", I have a cap, I'm not in the zig-zag! #AllHollande #DPDA
The presidential stature is acquired when you become President of the Republic. Sympathy is less about! #AllHollande #DPDA
In the next five years there will be no accession of Turkey to the Union. The conditions are not met. #AllHollande #DPDA
If I am elected, it is my project that will be applied, there will be no doubt. #AllHollande #DPDA
If I become the next head of state, I will not be the leader of the majority or the leader of the Socialist Party. #AllHollande #DPDA
Le Figaro makes a day every day that is not favorable to me. It's his right! I will always fight for freedom! #AllHollande #DPDA
@AlvoKuka Kuyaweka katika maisha kwa vitendo ndilo jambo kubwa zaidi. Tunayojifunza yanapotusaidia kutoka hatua moja kwenda hatua nyingine.
Very happy with the results of SIMCE 2011 of 4th and 8th Basic: the difference between high and low socioeconomic levels decreased.
There was also a historical increase in the Mathematics tests in 4th Basic and Social Sciences in 8th Basic. We are on the right path.
Congratulations to all the students, professors, parents, attorneys and directors of the schools. The efforts are paying off.
We are taking off! Towards the CunaPatria! All 11 will have its 13! We will live and we will win!
The empire and its bourgeois lackeys believed that they were overthrowing us. Tremendous surprise they took. I told them: this is not a Disarmed Revolution!
As a Soldier I tell you how proud I am of our People and our Soldiers! Bolívar Soldiers are! The Town of Bolívar we are!

Shame that while some hav strong opinions on election law, they hav not disclosed their viable plans 4 issues such as Jobs, deficiency and debt.
@hazem Yes but the translation is not accurate. . Not a shame but a loss!
@Hazim_Majali These days we can not distinguish between politics and economy and regardless of the names deficit and debt debt and create jobs need an integrated program
@FriederikeHell They both have to do with our future and the quality of life our children will have.
@mhawamdeh @hazem thank you
@FriederikeHell No what I was implying is that need to discuss economy as part of reforms. I agree with all issues you bought up in tweet

Are we able to give a better life to our children? Yes, it is the duty of the Republic! #ClermontFerrand # FH2012
Each generation must correspond to progress. France has not stopped, it must resume its march! #ClermontFerrand # FH2012
All my passion will be at the service of the priority to youth! #ClermontFerrand # FH2012
I have for several months presented my proposals: 60 commitments. I did not deviate, it's my consistency, my constancy. #ClermontFerrand
Trust does not proclaim itself, it shows itself. It is a link both personal and political. #ClermontFerrand # FH2012
It's not the markets that panic, it's the right that panics! #ClermontFerrand #f_inter
No poll has ever elected a president. It's you, and only you who will make this decision! #ClermontFerrand # FH2012
The best demonstration, the best procession, is universal suffrage! #ClermontFerrand # FH2012
I will not be hostage to anyone! #ClermontFerrand # FH2012
I have only one opponent, it's the right, it's the incumbent and nothing will distract me from my path! #ClermontFerrand # FH2012
I ask you to come and vote so that in the first round we make the victory irreversible, irrepressible, inevitable! # FH2012
The candidacy that I carry must gather, make the left win, but also and above all make succeed France! #ClermontFerrand # FH2012
We must earn our victory, go get it. I will fight to the end! #ClermontFerrand # FH2012
Together we will win! #ClermontFerrand # FH2012
I want to thank the 10,000 people who came to our rally in Jaude Square at #ClermontFerrand! # FH2012

Germán: without a doubt that your book will be for History! Bravo My Brother!

It is you who will participate in the change. I am only your candidate, it is you who will decide! #Chelles # FH2012
The challenge is the first round because it is April 22 that the dynamics will engage! #Chelles # FH2012
I am a candidate not to exist the time of a campaign, I am candidate to be president of the Republic! #Chelles # FH2012
I owe you the truth, I owe you the sense of responsibility. #Chelles # FH2012
The movement we are going to engage is that of victory! #Chelles # FH2012

We will give to the coming generation, to the diversity of France, all the means to succeed! #Chelles # FH2012
Have confidence, be mobilized, be aware of what is at stake! #Chelles # FH2012
Everything will be done until the end to make you fear the worst! #Chelles # FH2012
We will not let ourselves be taught by the incumbent! #Chelles # FH2012
We have no lesson to receive from him who, when he speaks of a woman or a man, first looks at his appearance! #Chelles # FH2012

It is we who will put order in the house France! #Chelles # FH2012
